stations.name: Anvil
stations.description: A sturdy iron anvil, its surface marked by countless hammer strikes. Perfect for forging weapons and tools.

stations.name: Workbench
stations.description: A well-worn wooden workbench equipped with various tools for leatherworking and armor crafting.

stations.name: Alchemy Table
stations.description: A cluttered table covered with vials, burners, and mysterious substances. The air smells of strange chemicals.

stations.name: Enchanting Altar
stations.description: An ancient stone altar inscribed with glowing runes. Magical energies pulse from its surface.

stations.name: Cooking Fire
stations.description: A crackling fire pit with a sturdy iron grate. Perfect for preparing hearty meals.
